name: 6th Annual IoT & AI Summit 2019
content: 6th Annual IoT & AI Summit 2019 “Unleashing the bold era of IoT & AI innovation” 3rd July 2019, Bangalore, India 6th Annual IoT & AI Summit 2019 will explore and review the various applications of Internet of Things (IoT), Artificial Intelligence (AI) combined. The purpose of the summit is to highlight the true potential of technology across multiple sectors and industries acting as a catalyst between policy makers, government, market movers, and thought leaders providing high level think tank leadership platform. IoT Delivery, NTT Data KEY THEMES DISCUSSED: • Going forward into the new era of IoT analytics with AI • Investing on data to raise a data-driven result making culture for their consumer as well as organizations • Secret to a successful start-up • Evaluation of the current ecosystem • Future of IoT – Predictions for a Connected World • Building a secure and scalable structure for commercial IoT • Future of energy with AI and Blockchain • AI- powered solution for prosumers • AI for the enterprise: Challenges & Opportunities • Is your enterprise well prepared for the AI revolution • Leveraging digital transformation with AI & deep learning • Deep learning applications to online payment fraud detection • Driving value from enterprise AI and how it is of use to business • What AI is and isn’t for your organization and why your business should care? • Powering digital transformation through AI • How to enable and apply digital business with the help of enterprise AI? • Collaborating IoT, digital transformation & enterprise security • 2019 cybersecurity trends and investment opportunities • Be part of a major networking opportunity WHO SHOULD ATTEND:- Business managers, IT professionals and Channel managers should all be present at the 6th Annual IoT & AI Summit 2019\.
